title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Academic Achievement Improvement Based on Brain Dominance Understanding and Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can accurately diagnose and explain their brain dominance type (left-brain/right-brain/whole-brain)
Learners can propose 3+ problem-solving strategies tailored to brain dominance characteristics
In PBL environments, learners collaborate with team members to perform problem-solving tasks, improving academic achievement by over 20%

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
